title: BRIEF-Veritex Holdings Amends Previously Reported Q4, FY 2017 Earnings
text: 36 AM / Updated 6 minutes ago BRIEF-Veritex Holdings Amends Previously Reported Q4, FY 2017 Earnings Reuters Staff Feb 26 (Reuters) - Veritex Holdings Inc: * ‍AMENDS PREVIOUSLY REPORTED EARNINGS FOR Q4 AND YEAR-ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017 ​ * SAYS AMEDNING REPORTED EARNINGS TO REFLECT CHANGES RELATED TO ‍DEFERRED TAXES RECORDED FOR ACQUISITION OF LIBERTY BANCSHARES​ * ‍RE-MEASUREMENT OF DEFERRED TAXES RESULTED IN A DECREASE IN EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $0.05 AND $0.06 FOR Q4 AND FY 2017, RESPECTIVELY​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
